extendedInfo.description: App 2 SD (Move app 2 SD)With this handy app, you'll have more control over your ever expanding collection of apps.this app solves all your memory issues.A great UI that makes it easy to:-â notify when a new movable app is installed.âadded setting menu.ânow notification can be disabled on setting menu.âshows system apps.âexport app list to sdcard in csv format.âold and new tab design.âshow internal and sdcard total and free storage.â View all SD card capable apps and move them.â show app cache/data/code/total size.â move apps from phone to SD Cardâ uninstall apps.âclear cache.ânotify if cache size is higher than 512kb in setting(by default it is disabled).â Filtered system apps.â sort through apps stored on phone and SD cardâ move apps back to phone.â view app on Marketâ open app.â share app link with one click.â sort by install time.â move all apps option.â show app details page.â support "Move2SD Enabler"âMove to sd or movetosd all sdmove apps and also sdwatch card for memory shortages.This app is not used to backup apps to SD card. It only helps you to move a portion of apps used space to SD card.Galaxy S3 is not supported:* Galaxy S3 configures the SD card as a secondary external storage. This is configured by Samsung. Nothing developers can do about this. Please contact Samsung for details. No Notification Ads - we don't use any notification ads.If you are interested in helping us to translate this app to your native language, please let me know by email. Thanks.FAQ:-1. What is "App2SD"?"App2SD" is short for app to SD card, and it is also called app to sd.2. Why do so many apps that cannot moved to sdcard(App2SD)?ANS:-1.Only the app is configured to supported to be installed on SD card by the developer that can it App2SD. So you will see many apps are "On Phone Only".2.The app is copyright protected.3.APP2SD is a feature introduced from android version 2.2 ,so not all apps support this feature.4.The developer forces his app can only be installed to phone storage.This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Push Ads
reviews.comment: Ads is OK, but push ads, no! Uninstalled before testing. Updated: Reinstall after reply of Devankit saying there\'s no Push Ads, but Appbrain Ad Detector says there\'s 4 concerns, among them is Push Ads

reviews.title: So far great. .maybe not
reviews.comment: I have loved ap but having adds appear on phone on home and ap menu avg is tagging this as culprit :-(   Going to experiment del see if adds are gone. Dont mind adds in apps if stated but not happy when on my phone menus.  Please make a pay version.  THIS is the only app that Ive found that moves things truly to the external sd card.

reviews.title: Help please!
reviews.comment: I am trying to move my appz to my sd card on a Samsung galaxy rush. This is now the 5th app I have installed trying to do so. Same result with all apps. When I select the apps I want to move it brings me to the app info but there is no option to move it to my sd?.? Please advise me as to what I am doing wrong.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Seems to only point out which apps are able to mount to sd card which is ok if your phone let\'s you. Most people can do this without the app would developer please work out how to configure the s3 to move apps to sd card as this only seems possible if your phone is rooted?
